text: I am a 3rd-year student studying Computer Science at the University of Michigan College of Engineering who is interested in exploring bleeding-edge web technologies and machine learning algorithms. I have experience in web systems, databases, machine learning, native app development.

I am currently conducting research under the Radiological Health Engineering Lab, where I am working on a data processing pipeline and designing machine learning models to learn from live radiation data.
I am also contributing to optical character recognition correction software using natural language processing techniques for a Multidisciplinary Design team sponsored by Proquest.
